document_data.History: Hastarglyrr was born sometime between the late 7{{th}} and late 14{{th}} centuries DR.<ref group="note">While Hastarglyrr's birth year or century is not stated, it is listed as an [[dragon aging|adult]] dragon as of [[1492 DR]].
